EmailTemplate.name: India/SS61.03-01-21 BNK India/SS61 Email 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Infographic: Reducing Cash-In-Transit Costs By Up To 50%
EmailTemplate.textOnly: As someone who operates ATMs in India, you know first-hand that cash withdrawals are growing. You also know what a headache it is to manage that volume of rupees: Counting. Recounting. Transport. Replenishment. Security. Moving cash through the branch. But cash recycling makes all of that much easier and less expensive. Indeed, it could cut your cash-in-transit costs by up to 50%. And reduce your total operating costs up to 30%. See the results you could achieve in our new cash recycling infographic. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> Â© 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
